name: Happy Neighbors
description:
Challenge your puzzle solving skills with Happy Neighbors.

  • logic puzzle game - simple, fun and challenging
  • build and destroy fences to separate the neighbors
  • make sure they are happy by dividing everything equally between them
  • simple gameplay rules, increasing challenge
  • 101 puzzles to solve
  • colorful 3D cartoonish graphics
  • ambient joyful music

"A day without a puzzle is, you know, boring"
